Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.entities.cards

Class CardBehavior

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.entities.cards.CardBehavior
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
LockBehavior, MotherNatureBehavior, ProfessorBehavior, StudentBehavior
public abstract class CardBehavior extends Object implements Serializable
Generic behavior of a character card

  • Constructor Details

    • CardBehavior

      public CardBehavior(GameBoard gameboard, int id, int exchange_students, int drop_students, int nof_students, int takeable_students, int extra_points, int nof_locks, boolean pick_island, boolean avoid_towers, boolean avoid_color, Behaviors behavior_name, int extra_steps)
      Defines a behavior
      Parameters:
      gameboard - gameboard of reference
      id - card id
      exchange_students - number of students the card can exchange
      drop_students - number of students the card can drop
      nof_students - generic number of students
      takeable_students - number of students that is possible to take away
      extra_points - number of mother nature's extra points
      nof_locks - number of no entry tiles on the card
      pick_island - wether the player can choose an island
      avoid_towers - wether mother nature has to avoid towers
      avoid_color - wether mother nature has to avoid a color
      behavior_name - name of the behavior
      extra_steps - number of extra steps mother nature can perform
